instruction: Select an appropriate conclusion for this short story.
input: Once upon a time, there was a brave little rabbit named Wilbur. He had been living in the forest for some time, and he was tired of living all alone. All of the other forest animals were friendly to him, but he wanted to find someone who he could really connect with and be best friends with. Wilbur decided he would set out on a big journey to find just the right friend.
output: Wilbur kept traveling until he found a new friend, one who he shared a special bond with and would remain close to for life. The two of them were now best friends, and they spent the rest of the summer exploring the forest together.
